parameters.name: syncConfig
parameters.description: Describes a Sync configuration for a resolver. Specifies which Conflict Detection strategy and Resolution strategy to use when the resolver is invoked. conflictHandler (string) --- The Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict. OPTIMISTIC_CONCURRENCY: Resolve conflicts by rejecting mutations when versions don't match the latest version at the server. AUTOMERGE: Resolve conflicts with the Automerge conflict resolution strategy. LAMBDA: Resolve conflicts with an Lambda function supplied in the LambdaConflictHandlerConfig. conflictDetection (string) --- The Conflict Detection strategy to use. VERSION: Detect conflicts based on object versions for this resolver. NONE: Do not detect conflicts when invoking this resolver. lambdaConflictHandlerConfig (dict) --- The LambdaConflictHandlerConfig when configuring LAMBDA as the Conflict Handler. lambdaConflictHandlerArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function to use as the Conflict Handler.

nested_params.name: conflictHandler
nested_params.description: The Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict.

nested_params.name: conflictDetection
nested_params.description: The Conflict Detection strategy to use.

nested_params.name: lambdaConflictHandlerConfig
nested_params.description: The LambdaConflictHandlerConfig when configuring LAMBDA as the Conflict Handler.

nested_params.name: lambdaConflictHandlerArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function to use as the Conflict Handler.

parameters.name: runtime
parameters.description: Describes a runtime used by an Amazon Web Services AppSync pipeline resolver or Amazon Web Services AppSync function. Specifies the name and version of the runtime to use. Note that if a runtime is specified, code must also be specified. The name of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed value is APPSYNC_JS. The version of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed version is 1.0.0.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed value is APPSYNC_JS.

nested_params.name: runtimeVersion
nested_params.description: The version of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed version is 1.0.0.

nested_items.name: functionId
nested_items.description: A unique ID representing the Function object.

nested_items.name: functionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Function object.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Function object.

nested_items.name: requestMappingTemplate
nested_items.description: The Function request mapping template. Functions support only the 2018-05-29 version of the request mapping template.

nested_items.name: functionVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the request mapping template. Currently, only the 2018-05-29 version of the template is supported.

nested_items.name: syncConfig
nested_items.description: Describes a Sync configuration for a resolver.

nested_items.name: conflictHandler
nested_items.description: The Conflict Resolution strategy to perform in the event of a conflict.

nested_items.name: conflictDetection
nested_items.description: The Conflict Detection strategy to use.

nested_items.name: lambdaConflictHandlerConfig
nested_items.description: The LambdaConflictHandlerConfig when configuring LAMBDA as the Conflict Handler.

nested_items.name: lambdaConflictHandlerArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the Lambda function to use as the Conflict Handler.

nested_items.name: maxBatchSize
nested_items.description: The maximum batching size for a resolver.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed value is APPSYNC_JS.

nested_items.name: runtimeVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the runtime to use. Currently, the only allowed version is 1.0.0.

nested_items.name: code
nested_items.description: The function code that contains the request and response functions. When code is used, the runtime is required. The runtime value must be APPSYNC_JS.
